mapper.select:
select
distinct
,create_name,update_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT id AS ids , username AS create_name FROM user) us ON create_by = ids LEFT JOIN (SELECT id AS idss , username AS update_name FROM user) uss ON update_by = idss where 1=1
AND username like concat('%',#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
AND `name` like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by create_at desc limit ${pageStart},${pageSize}

select count(1) FROM user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT id AS ids FROM user) us ON u.create_by = ids LEFT JOIN (SELECT id AS idss FROM user) uss ON u.update_by = idss where 1=1
AND username like concat('%',#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
AND `name` like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT
FROM user WHERE 1=1
AND `username` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER By create_at DESC
LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM user WHERE 1=1
AND `username` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
